channel.title: research on ian spangler
channel.description: Recent content in research on ian spangler

item.title: Property protocols and digital real estate technologies
item.description: How do spatial data standardization practices impact housing markets? How does digitization in the real estate industry change the design and enforcement of these standards? Who benefits?

item.title: Sweat sensing and the geopolitics of perspiration
item.description: How have medical sciences observed, quantified, and analyzed perspiration over the last 400 years? More importantly, to what ends?

item.title: Transparency, assetization, and digital data brokers
item.description: How do actors in the financial world—and particularly in the data broker industry—view the concept of transparency?

item.title: Short-term rentals and the platforming of emotional labor
item.description: How do short-term housing rental platforms (like Airbnb) change people's relationships to the places they live? How do these platforms enroll people into value capture processes?
